thread.title: Ground News - "Don't Be Ashamed Of Negotiating": Pope Appeals Ukraine To End War With Russia
thread.title_full: Ground News - "Don't Be Ashamed Of Negotiating": Pope Appeals Ukraine To End War With Russia

author: NDTV
title: Ground News - "Don't Be Ashamed Of Negotiating": Pope Appeals Ukraine To End War With Russia
text:
Summary by NDTV Pope Francis has said in an interview that Ukraine should have what he called the courage of the "white flag" and negotiate an end to the war with Russia that followed Moscow's full-scale invasion two years ago and that has killed tens of thousands. Francis made his comments in an interview recorded last month with Swiss broadcaster RSI, well before Friday's latest offer by Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan to host a summit between Ukraine and Ru… Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
